title: Reduce landed cost variance across supplier lanes — publish transparent breakdown
description: Publish transparent landed-cost breakdown including duties, freight, and insurance mapped by supplier lanes to keep variance below 3%.

title: Automate ingestion of duties, freight, and insurance to achieve ≥90% SKU coverage
description: Automate ingestion of duties, freight, and insurance components with validations to reach data coverage ≥ 90% of SKUs.

title: Maintain landed cost variance < 3% via monthly variance review
description: Run monthly variance reviews and corrective actions to keep landed cost variation below 3% across supplier lanes.

title: Accelerate customs clearance and exception handling
description: Reduce average clearance time below 24h through process rigor and audits; define escalation playbooks for exceptions.

title: Accelerate customs clearance and exception handling — audits ≥95%
description: Accelerate customs clearance and exception handling by implementing audits and controls to achieve ≥95% pass rate and sustain <24h clearance.

title: Accelerate customs clearance — monitor and auto-escalate exceptions
description: Monitor clearance time continuously and auto-escalate exceptions to keep average clearance below 24h.

title: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection — single authoritative calculator
description: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection: consolidate calculators into a single authoritative cost calculator and detect lane cost spikes.

title: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection — 48h resolution
description: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection with early-warning alerts resolved within 48 hours for lane cost spikes.

title: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection — transparency dashboards
description: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection; publish transparency dashboards and savings tracking for leadership review to sustain quarterly savings vs. target.
